text: Robert Shelton may refer to: * Robert Shelton (critic) (1926-1995), music and film critic * Robert Shelton (Ku Klux Klan) (1929–2003), Grand Wizard of United Klans of America * Robert N. Shelton (born 1948), former President of the University of Arizona and current director of the Fiesta Bowl * Robert C. Shelton Jr. (born 1934), American politician in the New Jersey General Assembly ==See also== * Robert Sheldon (disambiguation)
title: Robert Shelton
